text: The Iraq Resolution or the Iraq War Resolution (formally the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002,Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002 (pdf) is a joint resolution passed by the United States Congress in October 2002 as Public Law No: 107-243, authorizing military action against Iraq.The "news release" linked to from a blog post dated Sunday, December 10, 2006 is no longer present on the web site "whitehouse dot gov", but an archived copy of it does exist at "web dot archive dot org". See ==References== Category:2002 in the United States Category:Iraq War
title: Iraq Resolution
